> What kind of comments are you looking for? 

I guess right now I would like to know what ideas
people have for neural net inputs.  First, I tried
inputting the angles of each joint in the body.  That
way, they have some sense of their body's
pose/gesture.  Lately I have been thinking of the
following options for neural net inputs:

* joint angles
* joint velocities
* body part positions (global coordinates or maybe
offset from the center of mass)
* overall center of mass
* forces on body parts

They need to have enough information to be able to
perform a complex sequence of actions (e.g. walking). 
Any thought on these ideas for inputs or have other
ideas?  Do you think some are more or less important?

Thanks.

Tyler
